law.text: At annual meetings such landowners shall elect a successor to the director or directors whose term expires as of that date and to any other or others whose death or resignation may have occurred since the last regular meeting. They shall receive the annual report of the board of directors and shall transact such other business as may properly come before them. The board of directors shall file a copy of their annual report and a copy of the minutes of their annual meeting with the clerk of the board of county commissioners.
